item.title: Installation
item.description: Installing Hugo Catalog is very easy, simply clone the repo edit a few site settings and you are on your way to have your own brand style guide. item.title: Colors
item.description: Overview Color is an instantly recognizable and important element of any brand. Applying our color palette will help create strong visual communication in everything from product UI to illustration and iconography. Rewst Teal Rewst Purple is bold and vibrant. It is the only color weird enough to represent our creativity, wisdom, energy, and enthusiasm. It is our energetic brand expression building recognition in moments when our voice must be clear and memorable.

item.title: Typography
item.description: Overview Typography plays a huge role at Rewst. It’s our vessel for us to speak both internally and externally. We rely on things like layout, color, and weight to create a hierarchy for our communications. Below you will find helpful guidelines around when, where, and how to use our approved typefaces. Goldplay At Rewst we use Goldplay Sans for everything brand and marketing—from banner ads to billboards. Goldplay Sans is rounded, soft terminals give it a friendly and expressive look, and its modern and contemporary style as well as its classic proportions make it an excellent choice for headlines, logotypes, branding

item.title: Illustration
Iconography
item.description: Overview Icons are a great way to signal, label, or highlight simple information with speed and clarity. At Rewst, we use icons across different brand touchpoints from marketing to environment to product. Below you will find 2 different libraries and guidelines around when to use each. Streamline Icons In order to create a cohesive experience, we use Streamline Icons for all things Rewst Marketing. This library is beautiful and absolutely massive.

item.title: Logos
item.description: Overview The Rewst logo is a sacred part of our brand. Because of that, it’s imperative that we protect it and use it correctly. To preserve the integrity of our identity, we want to ensure that our branding is always recognizable, legible, and stands out against any competing design elements. Hugo Catalog Logos 6.32 KB Construction Rewst has been carefully constructed to provide personality and excellent visual clarity at all sizes.
